page.shortlink: api sql namespace table snapshot class store function
page.prototype: L Store (Connection as SQL::Connection [, CreateTable as L [, EventScript as C ] ] )
page.description: Creates a table and stores data contained in the snapshot into the database referenced by the open connection provided. If the parameter CreateTables is set to false, the table is assumed to exist.
page.discussion: Returns true if the function executed successfully and false if an error occurred.

argument.name: Connection
argument.description: An explicit, open AlphaDAO connection string to the database.

argument.name: CreateTables
argument.description: Optional. Default value is *[xb:.t.]*. If *[xb:.t.]*, tables will be created if they do not already exist. If *[xb:.f.]*, the operation assumes the table exists.

argument.name: EventScript
argument.description: Optional. A string that contains an Xbasic event script that is executed when an event is triggered during the operation. See [DatabaseSnapshot Events] for additional information.
